subject: Draft: Follow-up on pricing
bodyPreview: Good morning, Circling back with answers inline. I refactored a couple of helpers to make the interface cleaner — shouldn’t affect your side, but call it out if anything surprises you. - Scope: finalize API contract (auth, pagination, errors) - Risks: rat

body.content:
Good morning,

Circling back with answers inline.

I refactored a couple of helpers to make the interface cleaner — shouldn’t affect your side, but call it out if anything surprises you.

  • Scope: finalize API contract (auth, pagination, errors)
  • Risks: rate limiting during onboarding, CSV import memory spikes
  • Timeline: cut beta by next Wednesday, GA in two weeks
  • Owners: backend — me; frontend — pairing with design

I’ll post a brief update in Slack after I push the branch.

— Alex
